forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds this morning will give way to generally sunny skies for the afternoon. High 12C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 53F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low 3C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 37F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable clouds early. Some decrease in clouds later in the day. High 57F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 6C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 43F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. High near 15C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. High 58F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 12C. Winds SSE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with a steady, soaking rain late. Increasing winds. Low 54F. Winds SSE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with rain likely. High 13C. Winds SSE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with rain likely. High 56F. Winds SSE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach one inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 44F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High around 50F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.
